SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, we got something here.
Let's dig it up.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_000_CUT_010_030.text:
You gotta be kidding me here...
Still, I suppose it might come in handy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG06_SUCCESS_AIRSHIP_.text:
It's saying something or other
about the sand's energy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG04_SUCCESS_WARSHIP_.text:
Apparently it'll keep the sand
from falling apart?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG00_SUCCESS_DIVING_0.text:
Sounds like it'll keep the sand
from clumping together.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG02_SUCCESS_FERRY_00.text:
It's talking about the sand's
shifting ability.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.text: Hey now, this could come in handy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_DIG_MISS_000_CUT_000_0.text: I'm pretty handy too, you know!

SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
It's hard to believe anybody actually
lives in a desert world like this.
Seems like the Emerald Wave's the
only thing I can rely on, maybe?

SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Blech! Got sand in my mouth!
Don't care much for that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now that is one humdinger of a battleship!
Fact it's just lying around means there must have
been an ocean at some point—and probably
people and civilization and all that, too.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Geez, now we got a scarecrow—looks
new, too. I wonder who made it? Also, what's a scarecrow even doing
here? It's not like I've seen any birds.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The scarecrow. The one right in front of you.
I haven't seen a human out this way in days.
Where exactly did you come from, anyway?
The airship? The cruise ship? The submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The scarecrow's talkin'! Sorry about that,
guy—I didn't know you were a resident here. Well, I'm Tsunanori Mido, and I'm looking
for spirits. Don't happen to know where
any might be, do you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh, you know my name! How wonderful. So yes, I'm Scarecrow. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea! Also, I don't know any spirits. Humans might know something though, so why not head over to the airship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Airship? Heck, fella, I just got here.
Got no idea where any airships are.
You mind taking me by there once?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One airship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Well, that's great, but these dunes are
shiftin' with such force that I keep gettin'
pushed back. The heck am I supposed
to do about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Boy, that's one humdinger of a robot!
Does it still work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
YO, SCARECROW! BEEN A HOT MINUTE, BUDDY!
ALSO, WHY ARE YOU WANDERING ALL OVER FROM
HELL TO BREAKFAST WITH THIS HUMAN, HUH!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Wait, so you can make the sand flow
in a different direction?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
ME? NAH! I CAN'T DO SQUAT, BUDDY!
BUT THE ROBOT CAN!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Okay, sure. Sounds great.
Now maybe ease up on all the yelling.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
SORRY ABOUT THAT! THIS IS JUST THE NATURAL
VOLUME FOR ME! NOW HANG ON AND I'LL GET
THAT SAND CHANGED FOR YOU, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Whoa, this airship's a wreck.
You sure people even live in here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh sure! Lots of 'em!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Got plenty of room to stretch out in here.
Also no sand, which is a nice bonus.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hey there. I'm Tsunanori Mido, and
I came to this world lookin' for spirits.
You usually get a lot of folks from
the outside or something?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
We most certainly do not! Hmm... But since
you are clearly standing here now, it could
mean the legend of Pandora is real! You must tell me everything
you know about Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Mind calmin' down there, pal?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: That's right! Let's all take it easy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Shut up, strawman! ...AHEM! Yes, well,
I suppose it's possible I got a smidge
excited there. Apologies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I'm the Professor, and I'm researching the history
of the Crowrealm. Though a desert now, this land
once had something called an 'ocean,' and this
very airship once soared through the skies.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Alas, now the world is nothing but sand,
and the airships lie in pieces on the ground.
And what is the cause of this misery, you ask?
The answer to that...is said to be Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh hey, I know that story: lady opened up
a box and dumped a buncha calamity all over.
You saying that's what happened here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Indeed, legend claims the one who opened the box was a human from the outside—and it goes on to say that the one to close the box will be another human from the outside.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, how I hope the legend is a lie. If it's true,
it means our world is held sway by the whims
of outsiders! And in that case, what are the
rest of us even worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Right? What's my worth?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, if I've got a role in this legend,
I'd better go find this Pandora thingamajig
and close 'er up. So where we headed?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
...Seriously? It's just a legend. Nothing more.
Do you truly plan to just blindly follow it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I've spent my whole life doing whatever people
ask me to. It's just sorta the path I'm on.
Also, if I can find your Pandora whatsit,
I bet anything it'll lead me to the spirits.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I don't know if I should call you an oddity or a nosy parker... Are all people from the outside like you? Er, anyway. Be that all as it may, I sadly have no idea where Pandora is. You'll just have to find it yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oooh, oooh! I know where it is!
It could be here. Or there.
Or way out there someplace.
Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Let me leave you with this warning:
Do not make friends with the scarecrows.
They're all irresponsible oafs to the last,
just like this straw-headed ninny here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Wait, so you folks didn't make 'em?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Perish the thought! If I had to guess,
I imagine they came from Pandora itself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Got another big ol' robot here.
Think Pandora's in there, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Never thought I'd be finding fiends in a
world with all this sand and machinery.
Think those fellas popped outta Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Sure, okay. And what about you scarecrow fellas? Are you older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, I guess there's nothing for it
but to go inside and have us a peek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, crud. Whole lot of nothin'.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess we gotta look somewhere
else for Pandora, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Hope you're up for the job when
shifting sands cut us off again.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Okay, this here's clearly a war robot.
What do you think? Could be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey there, fella. Any chance
this big tank thing is Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hm? Wait, so...
It is? Or it isn't?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Huh. Well, I think somebody would've realized
this was Pandora already if it was just lying
around, so I'm guessing this isn't it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Still, how can this thing change the
flow of sand it's so far away from? Wasn't asking you in particular,
by the way. No need to trouble yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Fair enough, guy. You at least know what 
the robot was used for once upon a time?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Okay, sure. Maybe you can just tell me
why there's always some kinda scarecrow
standing next to these robots?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hi, Sweetcrow! Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Well, now we're cookin'! Mind telling me
where I can find some spirits, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Spirits live in the ♥s of all scarecrows...
and you're totally welcome to take
my ♥ home, lover boy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't think I know you, friend.
Are you another junker?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nope! I'm Tsunanori Mido, and I'm out
here lookin' for the power of the spirits.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well now, that's some unusual treasure
you're out for. I mostly look for gears and
engine parts and showerheads and... Well,
you know. Things people want.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This place is a veritable mountain of treasure,
but because of that, I have a bunch of scoundrels
in here bugging me. ...See?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
They've been fighting a war ever since
Pandora opened up—even though the
world's like it is and no one has any
clue what the war is for anymore. Hell, I don't even know if we're supposed
to destroy this place or protect it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This is a submarine:
protector of the ocean.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Heck, there isn't even an ocean left to
protect. If we don't put a stop to the war,
they'll just keep fighting forever.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: And why would you do that? I don't see what you're getting out of all this, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The power of the spirits, probably.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
See, you get it! It's the not-knowing that
makes it a real treasure hunt; can't search
for something if you know it's guaranteed.
Anyway, good luck to you, friend.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pretty sure this is the only place
we haven't already looked at yet.
Think Pandora could be here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Maybe.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey there. I'm Tsunanori Mido,
and me and my scarecrow pal here
are looking for some spirit power.
...Oh, and Pandora, I guess.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Pandora, eh? Yes, I've heard the rumors:
Close the box and poof! The war is over.
Honestly, I have doubts that something
so convenient actually exists.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Still, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, as you've no doubt seen.
So if Pandora is anywhere, it's likely here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if there's somebody in there...
Heck, might even be the person who
opened Pandora in the first place.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, if they went in as a human and
are still alive, no doubt they're some
kind of monster in their own right.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Then let's go hunt a monster!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Lots of robot production lines here,
but most of 'em look flat busted.
Think that was the last one, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: No, listen. Something is still operational around here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hey, look! Monsters over that way.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Boy, just look at that puppy go!
Whatcha think it's making there?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sand. It's making sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
You scarecrows are all the same:
liars to the last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Well now, hang on there a second... This thing is making sand— or at least some kinda real fine particulate. Wait, hold on. You think that means it made all the sand out in the desert? Is the sand actually a buncha little tiny robots all runnin' around!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: ...Pretty sure it's just sand. But even if it was robots, what good would that do us?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: It might mean we can control it. I thought it was weird we could change how the sands shifted, but it all makes sense now. There's some kinda system that relays orders to the sand. I bet you anything that's what Pandora is!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Okay, let's say you're correct, and the robots
covered the world in sand to win the war.
The war is over now, but the sand remains.
So how are we supposed to remove it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I don't know about all that,
but I'd probably start by closing
Pandora and stopping these fellas
here from making any more sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm starting to think this deal about a
fella coming in from the outside to close
up Pandora is just some old wives' tale. I mean, heck! These sand fiends just
keep coming, and there isn't a thing
I can do about it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we won't solve this problem with
tired brains. How about I keep watch
for a bit while you rest?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Ho, friend! Find any treasure?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Nope!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, everything good is buried beneath
the sand, so all you need to find it is
a little luck...and a secret weapon.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
My little friend here can find all sorts
of things buried in the sand. Poor thing managed to survive the war,
but can't seem to put it behind him.
Hoping this little treasure hunt of yours
can help him move past it for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey, if it'll help us find something
to fight Pandora, I'm all for it.
What's your name there, slugger?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sarab.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Good to meet you, Sarab. We're all
countin' on you to find something
that'll help us fight Pandora, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: We believe in you, Sarab!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Did you figure out a way
to fight the sand yet?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
That's gonna depend on what Pandora does.
Right now, we can't do much but throw
ourselves at it and hope for the best.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
It stopped... You did it!
You closed Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Hey, looks like you found some
treasure. Good for you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text:
Well done! Now it's our turn to show
our worth: we're going to turn the
Crowrealm into a world of sky and
water and green once more!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: So what's that mean for me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_000_C.text: Why not come with me, guy?

SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Don't see how folks can live in a desert,
but I guess it takes all kinds. Better hit
the road and see if I can find 'em.

SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Blech! Shoot! Got sand in my mouth!
Don't care for that one bit, no sir.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Airship ruins! I bet these puppies used to
fly around the sky like birds. But we got no
birds here now—not even crows. What even happened to this place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Don't see why a fella'd put a perfectly good
scarecrow out here when there aren't any crows.
Looks a lot newer than the wreckage, too.
Wonder who stuck it here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Holy shoot!
It's a talkin' scarecrow!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'm a talker, all right!
Haven't seen a human out this way
in quite a few days, though. So where'd you come from?
Cruise ship? Battleship? Submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sorry about that, guy—didn't know you were a
resident here. I'm Tsunanori Mido, and I'm
looking for spirits. Don't happen to know
where I can find some, do ya?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oooh! Okay, so my name is Scarecrow— er, not that you asked. But as for why I'm a scarecrow, I have no earthly idea. Also, I don't know any spirits. Humans might know something though, so why not head over to the submarine?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Submarine? Heck, fella, I just got here.
Got no idea where any submarines are.
Er, don't suppose you'd mind taking me?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One submarine, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Well, that's great, but these dunes are
shiftin' with such force that I keep gettin'
pushed back. The heck am I supposed
to do about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Boy, that's one humdinger of a robot!
Does it still work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Hello, Sweetcrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Scarecrow, baby! Good to see you! ♥
And sure, that's an easy ask. ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Wait, so you can make the sand flow
in a different direction?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Not me, hot stuff. But the robot can! ♥
Go on now, big guy! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
So this is a submarine, eh? Guess that means
there used to be an ocean here at some point.
How long ago was that, do ya think?
Are there seriously still people here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Nice and chilly in here—and no sand,
neither. A fella could get used to this.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, well! Not often we see outsiders
around these parts. Who might you be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Tsunanori Mido. I've come by this
here world lookin' for spirits.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, joy. Another weirdo. Well, as you can see,
the Crowrealm has been devastated by a war.
If there's something so nice as spirits here,
I certainly don't know about it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Heck, fella, spirits are everywhere!
I mean, you're alive, aren't ya?
Nothing can live without spirits,
so that's proof they're around.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, a spirit worshipper. Joy and joy again.
Well, whatever. Feel free to look around
and see what you find; maybe you'll even
get lucky and locate a wayward spirit.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Any idea where spirits might be?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
If you're asking me for a special place
out here in the desert, there's only
one option: Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Now wait just a second there, guy.
Isn't Pandora that funny box crammed
full of bad stuff that some lady opened?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
And a scholar on top of everything.
If you know about Pandora, that means
it's likely infected your world as well.
No wonder you're searching for spirits.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, it can't be long now until this whole
world is devoured by Pandora, so I very
much hope you're able to locate it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
So I take it you don't
know where it is, huh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Oooh, but I know where it is! It could be here. Or there. Or way out that way someplace. Could be anywhere, really!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wiser words were never spoken. Look,
just have Scarecrow take you where
you want to go; that's his job.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Okay, this here's clearly a war robot.
What do you think? Could be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hey there, fella. Any chance
this big tank thing is Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hm? Wait, so...
It is? Or it isn't?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Huh. Well, I think somebody would've realized
this was Pandora already if it was just lying
around, so I'm guessing this isn't it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Got another big ol' robot here.
Think Pandora's in there, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Never thought I'd be finding fiends in a
world with all this sand and machinery.
Think those fellas popped outta Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Sure, okay. And what about you scarecrow fellas? Are you older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, I guess there's nothing for it
but to go inside and have us a peek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, crud. Whole lot of nothin'.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess we gotta look somewhere
else for Pandora, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Hope you're up for the job when
shifting sands cut us off again.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Still, how can this thing change the
flow of sand it's so far away from? Wasn't asking you in particular,
by the way. No need to trouble yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Fair enough, guy. You at least know what 
the robot was used for once upon a time?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Okay, sure. Maybe you can just tell me
why there's always some kinda scarecrow
standing next to these robots?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Oh, and then tell us where we could
find some spirits here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: THE SPIRITS ARE THE SCARECROWS! I'M THE SPIRIT, BUDDY!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text: Only joke here is your face, guy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Are you people nuts? What are you doing
here? The robots will tear you to shreds
if they find you! Okay, let's back up. I'm the Engineer,
and I'm looking for a way to turn
the tide of this war in our favor.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Hey there. I'm Tsunanori Mido,
and me and my scarecrow pal here
are looking for some spirit power.
...Oh, and Pandora, I guess.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, war robots continue to be produced
in this place, so if Pandora is real,
this makes as much sense as anywhere.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Speaking of which, we've got
a war robot incoming!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Gonna be mighty disappointed if that
was Pandora, believe you me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Yes, I suppose it was a little pathetic
for an immortal war machine. You'll likely
have to keep searching somewhere else.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, we'll poke around some more and
come back by if we don't find anything.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This old battleship here
might be the place.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Could be Pandora, yep!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: This is Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You knew about this place, guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, if you're so shootin' smart, you shoulda
closed up Pandora and ended this whole mess.
Or at least got some help if you couldn't
pull it off all by yourself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I am the Wiseman. Knowledge alone
is satisfaction enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, bless your heart. Guess you won't
mind if I take a peek inside, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: In we go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This battleship looks flat busted.
No power or nothing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Totally.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And yet, I hear a sound.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You followed us, guy? Thought you were
happy just sitting around knowing stuff.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I do not know what lies inside.
Therefore, I must learn.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, do you happen to know anything
else about Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora is sand. Pandora creates the sand.
It buries this world in mountains of sand,
causing it to suffocate.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Guess we need to stop the sand production
line, then. Sounds easy, but I suppose
somebody woulda up and done it already
if that was the case.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That I do not know.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Then I guess we better find out, eh?
Come on, folks!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The sand is fiends.
The fiends are sand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
There's something awful funny about
this sand. Maybe magic or something?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora controls the sand. Every grain is
a perfect miniature recreation of Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So we can change the flow because
it's sending orders to each grain? Heck, that's it! If we can just figure out
a way to muck up the works with that sand,
we can fight the fiends.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds like you found Pandora.
So what happens now?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
That Pandora is really something;
I got no idea how to fight it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Why not try this thing?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I went ahead and fixed it up earlier.
I think it's some kind of search mech?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You know, I bet this thing was designed to
help folks like us find ways to fight Pandora—
so let's fire it up and see what it can do!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: And we're off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: The time to battle Pandora has come.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
Shoot, guy, I see why folks call you
the Wiseman; that's exactly what
we're heading out to do here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text:
The sand has stopped.
Pandora has been sealed.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Can't believe you managed to find Pandora and close it... Who are you, anyway?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Just some weirdo who worships the spirits— but it takes all kinds to save the world. Speaking of which, it's time for you to get back and save your own world, yes?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: I want to save worlds too!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: Then let's save them together, bud!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE1_WARSHIP_END_000.text: You can save them from here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Submarine ruins, eh? Guess that means this
place was an ocean before it became a desert.
Suppose that's what happens with the ol'
climate change or...whatever's going on.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
This scarecrow seems to be keeping
watch over the submarine, maybe?
Er, do they even get crows here? Well, either way, it probably means
we got folks living nearby.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Good to meetcha, fella. I'm Tsunanori Mido,
and I came to this world to find spirits.
Don't suppose you know where they are?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Wonderful to meet you as well! I'm Scarecrow,
and I've been standing here for three thousand
days waiting for someone like you to come by.
Oh, but this is a glorious moment!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Heck, guy, your legs must be stiff as
two-by-fours if ya been standin' out here
that long! Is it gonna put you out to
stand and chat with me a little more?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Not at all! I'm a talker—I love talking. So where are you from, Tsunanori Mido? The airship? The battleship? The cruise ship?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Different world, actually—and believe you me,
I don't know left from right or up from down.
Think maybe you could show me around?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, I'd be delighted! I'm bored to tears
with all this standing around. Follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One cruise ship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Well, that's great, but these dunes are
shiftin' with such force that I keep gettin'
pushed back. The heck am I supposed
to do about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I may not be sharpest rake in the shed,
but that robot there is clearly made for
fighting. You don't think it's the type to
come alive and attack us, do you?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Hello, Strangecrow! I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, so you can make the sand flow
in a different direction?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Not sure this fella's even
listening to us here...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Gotcha. In that case, I'll just assume
he's happy to pitch in and help out.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TANK_000_CUT_01.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
So this is the cruise ship, eh? Guess all
those dreams of a fancy life on the high
seas dried up with the oceans. You really
think we might find spirits here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Spirits? No idea. But people? Yes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
This hunk of junk barely looks like a
cruise ship anymore, but at least there
isn't any sand blowin' around.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, I'm not selling anythin' at all, pal.
My name's Tsunanori Mido, and I'm trying
to track down spirits. They've gotta be here
somewhere, so I'm out lookin' for clues.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, I see. I thought you were a junker.
Well, I'm the Engineer, and I don't know
anything about spirits or the occult—
and nor do I care, if we're being honest.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, how about this: You know any
places around here that have a whole
buncha natural power?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this sand-blighted hellhole? Hmmm...
Well, I suppose a place like that
would have to be Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Just a second there. Pandora's that box deal
that unleashed a whole buncha trouble on the
world, isn't it? That sure sounds occult-y to me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
In this world, Pandora is real. It is Pandora
that plunged this place into war and ruin,
and the horror of that continues to this day. So if we hope to free ourselves from all of
this someday, we must find a way to survive
and close Pandora once and for all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well then! Sounds like I'm gonna need to
swing by Pandora and get this thing done.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I didn't say nothin' about closing the sucker,
but I clearly need to go there if I want to
get anything done—so if you know the way,
now's the time to fill me in.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
I have no idea where Pandora is.
I suggest you ask a scarecrow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: You know where Pandora is, guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course! You simply go this way,
then that way, then some way!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Sounds like I'm following you, then.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
And here's another big ol' robot.
Think this is Pandora, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hey there, fella. Any chance this
four-legged robot deal here is Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Fair enough. Can you at least
tell us where Pandora is?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: Okay, sure. So what isn't a silly thing to ask a scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Spookcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
I CAN DO ANYTHING, BUDDY!
I'M A FREAKIN' SCARECROW!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Oh, and then tell us where we could
find some spirits here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Got another big ol' robot here.
Think Pandora's in there, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Never thought I'd be finding fiends in a
world with all this sand and machinery.
Think those fellas popped outta Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Sure, okay. And what about you scarecrow fellas? Are you older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, I guess there's nothing for it
but to go inside and have us a peek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, crud. Whole lot of nothin'.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess we gotta look somewhere
else for Pandora, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, misery! A spirit has come to reside
within me now that the fiends are gone!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: You should hold onto it for now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
This robot don't seem like it's Pandora,
but I bet it could change the sand's flow.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sand? Awww, that's easy! ♥
Also, heya, baby! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
You just ask for whatever you want, boo. ♥
There's nothing a scarecrow can't do! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Well, now we're cookin'! Mind telling me
where I can find some spirits, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Sure thing, sweet cheeks! ♥ Just ask
yourself this: what's the most special-est
place in the entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥
Here's a hint: it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hey, look at this old battleship.
This could be the place!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: You knew about this place, guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: That was pretty weak for Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Did I not just tell you
this is not Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sure did! So where is it, then?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Thought you said you were the wise guy who
knew everything. Well, whatever. I'll just
go out and find the thing myself.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
And just what do you plan to do
once you actually find Pandora!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
This is our last stop.
If it isn't here...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hey there, guy. I'm Tsunanori Mido.
Came to this world looking for spirits,
but right now I'm searching for Pandora.
Is this place Pandora, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So the legends are true—an outsider will
open Pandora, and an outsider will close it!
Is this prophecy? An accurate prediction?
A cleverly executed program? Whatever it may be, one thing is certain:
history will now begin to move.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Yes, well, introductions! I'm the Professor,
and I'm researching the Crowrealm's history.
I've spent hour after endless hour in this place,
but today, you will put an end to that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sure, I'll go ahead and pencil that in.
But are you positive closing this Pandora
deal is really gonna be that easy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I haven't the faintest idea; no one has
ever seen Pandora for themselves.
Even if it were inside this airship, I doubt
you'd gain access to it so easily.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Gotcha. Well, we won't know nothing
until we get in there and check, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Let's go check!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pretty rough there for a bit, but we made it
through. Still doesn't feel like we're any
closer to Pandora though, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Pandora's secrets lie deeper within.
Let's go, so I might witness history!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Deeper within!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Moving sand... So this is the truth of Pandora? It's just digging up sand from somewhere and scattering it all across our world? Absurd! Ridiculous! Complete and utter rot! I can't believe we let all time come to a standstill because we were afraid of this!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: This isn't sand—it's robots!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Oh, shoot! That's how we were able to control how the sand flows and all that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I fear I don't understand.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
It means we're surrounded by millions of sandy
little robots—and we're only gonna get out of
it alive by the grease of our cheeks.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Living is good, and I'd like to do
a whole lot more of it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: We made it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sure did, guy—but how the heck are we
supposed to fight those sand robots?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You can do it! That's why the legend says
you will be the one to close Pandora!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sure, but just saying that won't magically make
the impossible possible, and I don't see any way
in heck I'll be able to get any spirit power like this...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: What should we do!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You will need power equal to Pandora's
own if you wish to fight it and win.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Heck, guy. If you know helpful stuff,
don't be holding out on me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Use this. It hates Pandora, and may prove
a great aid in your upcoming fight.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Hate begets nothing!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: I seriously can't follow this guy.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Sarab
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Sarab will kill Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sounds good, little buddy.
We're all countin' on you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Well, shoot. Where's it going?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: Where is it going!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
The time has come at last... Oh, to think
I might witness a turning point in history
with my own eyes.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Not sure if I can pull this off here,
but I'll give it all I got.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
Can you believe it!? I was actually
able to experience the moment
a legend became reality!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Engineer
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text:
You did it! You actually closed Pandora!
Ha ha haaa... Hey, wait. What the heck are
we supposed to do with the rest of our lives?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE2_AIRSHIP_END_000.text: Yeah, what should I do with my life?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Boy, I've never been on a boat this big in
my whole life. Thing's in pretty sad shape
though—wonder how long it's been here?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh hey. A scarecrow. Poor guy's just been
sittin' here learning how weak and ephemeral
human society truly is, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Actually, this place was already
a ruin when I got here!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, cripes! You're not a scarecrow—
you're a fella that looks like one! Well, good to meetcha anyway, bud.
I'm Tsunanori Mido, and this here's
my first time in this world.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Why, yes! I am Scarecrow, actually! I had no idea I was famous enough for complete strangers to know my name!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text: Hang on a second. So you are a scarecrow? Boy, this is a real brain-buster right here... Anyway, I'm here looking for spirits. Don't suppose you know where to find any?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FERRY_000_CUT_0.text:
Nope! But I know who we can ask.
Please, follow me.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
And there you are!
One battleship, just as promised.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Well, that's great, but these dunes are
shiftin' with such force that I keep gettin'
pushed back. The heck am I supposed
to do about that?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FIRSTSTOP_000_C.text:
Oh, right! In that case,
I know where we should go.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Boy, that's one humdinger of a robot!
Does it still work?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Hello, Smilecrow. I'd like you to change
the flow of the sand, if you would.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Aha ha ha ha ha! Scarecrow?
Aha ha ha ha ha! The flow of sand?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
Wait, so you can make the sand flow
in a different direction?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text:
What a silly thing to ask a scarecrow!
Aha! Aha ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Smilecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: The flow of sand! Aha ha ha ha!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_FOURLEGS_000_CU.text: We should be able to proceed now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Considering what the cruise ship was like,
I'm expecting this battleship to be a wreck.
You sure people actually live here, guy?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Well, this thing isn't fighting anybody.
Guess folks just live in it now.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The arrival of souls from the
outside world is an omen.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
How'd you know I'm not
from around here, fella?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: I am the Wiseman. I know all.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now there's a piece of good news!
So where can we find some spirits, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you were lying when you said you
knew everything? That's disappointing.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Wiseman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You name others liars, outsider,
and find only disappointment
in your own expectations. But very well! I shall reveal your fate:
you will find Pandora within the submarine.
All else must be decided by you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text:
You know where this submarine
deal is, Scarecrow?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_WARSHIP_000_CUT.text: Yes. I will take you there.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Does this robot have anything
to do with the spirits?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Hello, Spookcrow. Think you could
turn the volume down to a dull roar?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TWOLEGS_000_CUT.text:
Oh, and do you know where we can
find spirits around here, maybe?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Got another big ol' robot here.
Think we might find some spirits?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, it's but a den of fiends inside!
You're better off staying here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Yeah, probably no point to it.
Also, hey, Sorrowcrow. Been a while.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Never thought I'd be finding fiends in a
world with all this sand and machinery.
Think those fellas popped outta Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Woe, but those things have always been here!
Honestly, I've no idea if they're older
than Pandora or not.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Sure, okay. And what about you scarecrow fellas? Are you older than Pandora?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Well, I guess there's nothing for it
but to go inside and have us a peek.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text: Well, crud. Whole lot of nothin'.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Guess we gotta look somewhere
else for the spirits, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Sorrowcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Alas, what misery! However, I can
at least change the flow of sand now
that those horrid fiends are gone.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_INDUSTRIAL_000_.text:
Hope you're up for the job when
shifting sands cut us off again.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
Probably isn't likely that this guy happens
to be packin' the power of the spirits, huh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text: Hello, Sweetcrow. Nice to see you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.speaker: Sweetcrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_HUMANOID_000_CU.text:
What's the most special-est place in the
entire Crowrealm, hmm? ♥ Here's a hint:
it's not some dumb robot! ♥

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
Okay, this here's clearly a war robot,
which means there's no spirit here, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text:
I fear everything good Strangecrow here says
always means both 'yes' and 'no.' My advice is
to just interpret his answers however you like.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_TANK_000_CUT_00.text: No way there's a spirit here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Airship ruins! I bet these puppies used to
fly around the sky like birds. But we got no
birds here now—not even crows. What even happened to this place?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
I say, who are you!?
Did you come from the outside!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Sure did. I've come here
looking for spirits.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
So you're not here to close Pandora? Blast!
Well, I am the Professor, a researcher of
the Crowrealm's history who is also seeking
a way to seal Pandora for good.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Hey, so what's this Pandora everybody keeps
yappin' on about? Some weird guy back on the
battleship said I'd find it on the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
The Wiseman said that? Then you
must go to the submarine at once!
This place holds nothing for you!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: But we have an enemy incoming...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
Now go! Find the Junkman in the submarine,
and get his help to close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text: You too, Scarecrow? Heck, I don't even know what this Pandora deal is. Not nice to just keep springing things like this on a guy, you know what I mean?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_AIRSHIP_000_CUT.text:
But hey, sure. Guess I'll go
swing by the submarine.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
So this is a submarine, eh? Guess that means
there used to be an ocean here at some point.
How long ago was that, do ya think? Still got no
idea how I'm going to find this Pandora deal though...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Ah! An outsider has arrived, just as the
Wiseman foretold. He also claimed that the
closing of Pandora was all in your hands.
So then...will you close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Don't mean to be rude or nothing, guy, but
I just came here to find spirits, and now
everybody keeps shouting at me about some
Pandora thing I don't even know about.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Pandora is the cause of all desolation in
this world. It brought calamity to the land
and launched a war that rages to this day. And if we hope to right these most
