terrible wrongs, we must close Pandora.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sounds like you think I'm some kind
of world-saving superhero there, bud.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I admit, you don't look much like one,
but I know you will do this. For us.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: For us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Okay, tell you what. If I find Pandora in
this here submarine, I'll go ahead and
believe your prophecy. Sound like a deal?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Got plenty of robots here, but not a whole
lot else. Certainly not some Pandora deal
like you were talking about, eh?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Not as of yet, but the path goes on.
Now come. I know we will find it.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: We'll find it!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Sorry, bud, but all that's here is sand. You know, maybe Pandora never even existed in the first place. You ever think of that? I mean, maybe it was you who did all the bad stuff to the world, and then you all decided to just blame it on this Pandora deal instead. You think that's possible?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The sand... Of course! The sand is the cause of all this! The sand is Pandora! It was created here in this place, and once it spread across the Crowrealm, it sent the entire world to ruin.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Gotta stop you there, bud. That's a fun
theory and all, but Pandora doesn't exist.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Sand's coming. Oh, and it's taken the
form of a fiend, so look out for that!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Actually, Pandora doesn't exist, which ended up
being super inconvenient for me. I think that's
what the Wiseman was trying to tell me with all
of his riddles and whatnot.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Is this true, Junkman?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Seems so. If this world is going to be saved,
it will be done not by an outsider, but by
the sweat and toil of those who live here.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Well, I suppose that's not so bad; the Crowrealm is our home, after all, so it's only fitting that we should be the main characters in its story. You have my thanks—and I swear to you now, we will take our world back! We cannot thank you enough.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Well, shoot, I'm real happy for you there,
but I never found myself any spirit power.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: Then I'll be your spirit!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text: The heck you talkin' about?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_000_CUT_.text:
Take good care of your
best pal Scarecrow, okay!?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
So if Pandora is actually all this sand,
how am I supposed to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
This prophecy of yours sure isn't
making me feel any better...

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Well done! I hear you found Pandora!
Did you manage to close it?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: Well, thing is, turns out Pandora is actually pretty much everything. Like, all this sand? Pandora. And lemme tell you, I don't even know where to start with that.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
The sand is...? But no, that can't be!
The sand isn't attacking us!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Aw cripes, I get it now. This stuff ain't
nothing but plain old sand unless somebody's
ordering it around—which means we just gotta
find a way to cut the orders off.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Wonderful! Now here, take this.
He's my little helper and a good,
fine boy, and I know he'll aid you.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text: This little helper got a name?

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_010_CUT_.text:
Well, all right then, Sarab. Let's you
and me go kick some Pandora butt.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: You can do it. You will. The prophecy says as much.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
You know something? This prophecy
is actually making me feel better.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Junkman
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The prophecy has been fulfilled,
and Pandora is closed at last.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Professor
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
The Crowrealm has finally been returned to us,
and from this day forward, we shall restore it
to its former glory with our own hands!

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Scarecrow
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text:
I'm going to stay here and help
with the restoration.

SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W13_EVAR_MIDO_ROUTE3_DIVING_END_000_.text: Actually, why not come with me?
